name: A-Series "Shturm" Protocol
desc: The A-series a.k.a. "Shturm" line of VIC ships is designed  with a specific set of technological solutions, giving them an edge in frantic close combat. The installation of this hullmod activates said solutions and severely reconfigures the ship's energy and weapon systems.

name: Laidlaw Tech
desc:
Exploiting the Laidlaw Resonance effect, VIC ships are capable of using excess energy of the electromagnetic field of their engines, which increases the output of their shields and energy weaponry.
Has following effects on the ship:

Shield's arc grows up to %s degrees, the more the shield is turned to the side of the ship
Increases shield rotation and unfolding speed by %s
Energy weapons base range increased by %s su, doesn't affect beam weapons
Energy weapons generate %s less flux

name: "Fervor" Protocol
desc: All damage dealt increased by %s. Increases all damage taken by %s. Phase cloak activation and upkeep increased by %s.

name: Loader Overdrive
desc:
Ballistic and energy weapons:
- Rate of fire increased by %s
- Flux cost reduced by %s
- Range reduced by %s
